name: DyWorld
title: DyWorld
author: Dysoch, Zukii
description: DyWorld, the successor of DyTech. Adding new systems, items, fluids, machines and enemies!!!! A complete overhaul that will change the way you play the game! Coding and idea's by Dysoch, Balancing by Zukii. Some models and code courtesy of Nova Kast, dgw and Anoyomouse. THIS VERSION IS STABLE UNTIL THE COMPLETE REWRITE INTO A NEWER VERSION. ESTIMATED TIME OF COMPLETION FOR THE REWRITE IS Q4 2020
